name: Multiple Dice Merge
description:
Do you want to train yourself to react sharp and make your logic of merging things better
if yes then you are in the right place
IT Games Present Multiple Merge Puzzle a 3d Board Game that is a super way to train your mind, make your mind sharp. It's a challenging, unique, timeless, and endless game. Match until the board is filled.
How to Play
Drag the objects on the board to Match 3 same objects and increase the power
Continue to merge to get the highest power
you get the bonus when all seven states of an object are merged this will destroy 3x3 around objects and give a bonus too
Keep matching till the board is full and have no space for new objects and the game ends
Features
The Multiple Merge Puzzle have different 3d objects listed below
1. Dice
2. Emoji
3. Polygon
4. Flower
5.Donut
6. Football
7. Star
8. Box
